name: Savage Babe's Silver Chest
description: To thank the adventurers for their care, Ivy took out her wooden box containing many interesting items.

name: Savage Babe's Wood Chest
description: To thank the adventurers for their care, Ivy took out her wooden box containing many interesting items.

name: Scalpel [1]
effect: Str ＋4,For Refining ＋10, the damage of [Back Stab] to Demi-Human ＋5%; For Refining ＋15, the damage of [Back Stab] to Demi-Human ＋10%

name: Scalpel [2]
effect: Str ＋4,For Refining ＋10, the damage of [Back Stab] to Demi-Human ＋5%; For Refining ＋15, the damage of [Back Stab] to Demi-Human ＋10%

name: Scarlet Bolt [1]
description: The dark red color of the bow is said by the gossip people to be dyed with the blood of the enemy.
effect: Dex ＋5,Refining increases by 1, auto attack increases by 20 points

name: Scarlet Bolt [2]
description: The dark red color of the bow is said by the gossip people to be dyed with the blood of the enemy.
effect: Dex ＋5,Refining increases by 1, auto attack increases by 20 points

name: Scarlet Dyestuffs
description: A magic potion to dye the hair red.

name: Scarlet Wizard Hat
description: Under the large brim of the hat, the magic was so strong that it was worn with a voice whispering in the ear, "come, use your magic to make this scarlet bloom."

name: Scell
description: Crystal made from monster parts. I wonder what you can make with it?

name: Scimitar
description: Proper bending of blade is good for cutting and killing anything.

name: Scorpio Crown
description: Crown that symbolizes Scorpio, one of the twelve zodiacal signs. It's inlaid with topaz.

name: Scorpio Crown Blueprint
description: Crown that symbolizes Scorpio, one of the twelve zodiacal signs. It's inlaid with topaz.

description: Crown that symbolizes Scorpio, one of the twelve zodiacal signs. It's inlaid with topaz.

name: Scorpio Diadem
description: Diadem that symbolizes Scorpio, the eighth of the twelve zodiacal signs. It's inlaid with topaz.
